items.headline: A Masterclass on preparing original Italian Lasagna in different versions starting from fresh pasta made from scratch.
objectives_summary: You'll learn everything I know about Lasagna making including my nonna's secrets and tricks! At the end of the course you'll master how to make fresh pasta with your own hands and how to prepare Lasagna to make your family and friends happy in all occasions.
